title: LF Duo Partner - Gold
body:
Gold 3 in Season 4, won 7/10 provis dropped to Silver 3 this season - quite a shit outcome, duo queue partner from season 4 is now diamond, and I have to be at least plat before I can duo with him again. LF any role good player who is maybe in the same boat? I am support/mid main, can play all roles, add me in game: Khaoz.

Can provide references to prove skill :) or we can play some normals

EDIT: Edited for clarity

replies.body: Sure, why not. My IGN is WQLFY add me if you want. ^_^
